title: Guardian of the Storm
description: The time of the great alignment is virtually upon them, and Kiran must travel to the temple of Zoe so that the way may be shown to him. He hadn’t counted on having to deal with the Earth born demon spawn determined to follow him on Hymria, the sacred journey that he hoped would lead him to the One. He must remain chaste to be considered worthy by Zoe. He must focus mind, body, and spirit upon Hymria or the way would not be revealed to him.He couldn’t get his mind off of Tempest.Revised and expanded from 2004 story.
author: Kaitlyn O'Connor
